product_highlights: Revivyl™ - speeds up skin renewal and microbiome balance
Ingredients to activate, protect, and balance skin microbiota
notes: Givaudan Active Beauty is a global leader in cosmetic actives with a comprehensive microbiome solutions platform. Their Revivyl™ ingredient accelerates skin renewal while supporting healthy skin microbiota balance. Givaudan focuses on developing active cosmetic ingredients designed to activate, protect, or balance skin microbiota through advanced scientific research. Part of the larger Givaudan Group, they offer extensive technical support, formulation guidance, and global distribution capabilities. Strong emphasis on clinical validation and efficacy testing. Trusted by premium cosmetic brands worldwide for microbiome-friendly formulations.
